products.name: Traditional Mixture
products.description: Spicy South Indian mixture with peanuts, sev, and aromatic spices
products.longDescription: Our Traditional Mixture is a beloved South Indian snack prepared using a balanced blend of crispy sev, roasted peanuts, fried lentils, and curry leaves. Made fresh in small batches, it delivers the perfect harmony of crunch, spice, and aroma that makes it ideal for tea-time or festive sharing.

reviewsList.name: Suresh V
reviewsList.comment: Perfectly spicy and super crunchy. Tastes exactly like the mixture we get in traditional snack shops.

reviewsList.name: Meenakshi Iyer
reviewsList.comment: Fresh and flavorful. Loved the peanuts and curry leaf aroma.

products.name: Sival
products.description: Thin, crispy rice flour snack lightly spiced for everyday crunch
products.longDescription: Sival is a light and crispy South Indian snack made from finely ground rice flour and subtle spices. Known for its delicate texture and mild seasoning, it is perfect for those who enjoy less oily, less spicy snacks without compromising on crunch and freshness.

reviewsList.name: Karthik M
reviewsList.comment: Very light and crispy. Not too spicy, perfect for kids and elders.

reviewsList.name: Lavanya S
reviewsList.comment: Fresh and tasty. Goes really well with evening tea.

products.name: Omapodi
products.description: Classic crispy omapodi made with gram flour and ajwain
products.longDescription: Our Omapodi is prepared using premium gram flour and aromatic ajwain (omam), fried to golden perfection for a crisp, melt-in-the-mouth texture. A timeless South Indian favorite, it can be enjoyed on its own or paired with sweets during festivals.

reviewsList.name: Ramesh N
reviewsList.comment: Excellent quality and very crisp. The ajwain flavor is spot on.

reviewsList.name: Deepa Krishnan
reviewsList.comment: Best omapodi I've ordered online. Not oily and very fresh.
